sourcesContent: import i,{useMemo as t}from"react";import n from"../utils/clsx";import{StyledPaginationHighlight as a}from"./pagination.styles";import{jsx as o}from"react/jsx-runtime";const g=({active:i,shadow:g,noMargin:e,rounded:h,css:r,...s})=>{const p=t((()=>e?`$$paginationSize * ${i}`:`$$paginationSize * ${i} + ${4*i+2}px`),[i,e]);return o(a,{"aria-hidden":!0,shadow:g,rounded:h,className:n("nextui-pagination-highlight",{"nextui-pagination-highlight--rounded":h,"nextui-pagination-highlight--active":i,"nextui-pagination-highlight--no-margin":e,"nextui-pagination-highlight--shadow":g}),noMargin:e,css:{left:`calc(${p})`,...r},...s})};g.toString=()=>".nextui-pagination-highlight";export default g;
